resources.string:
You're still here. I would have expected otherwise, given the rate of decay.

 In another life, I would have liked to do more for you. I think we're near the end of things in earnest now, though.

 Since I won't be seeing you again, I do hope that if there is a next life, it is kinder to you.
A mottle of defiance springs from some long-forgotten well.
